ya8.2.1:6.1: ⇒ Yassa cittaṃ uppajjati na nirujjhati tassa cittaṃ nirujjhissati na uppajjissatīti?
ya8.2.1:7.1: Pacchimacittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati na nirujjhati, nirujjhissati na uppajjissati.
ya8.2.1:7.2: Itaresaṃ cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati na nirujjhati, nirujjhissati ceva uppajjissati ca.
ya8.2.1:8.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana cittaṃ nirujjhissati na uppajjissati tassa cittaṃ uppajjati na nirujjhatīti?
ya8.2.1:9.1: ⇒ Yassa cittaṃ na uppajjati nirujjhati tassa cittaṃ na nirujjhissati uppajjissatīti?
ya8.2.1:10.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana cittaṃ na nirujjhissati uppajjissati tassa cittaṃ na uppajjati nirujjhatīti?
ya8.2.1:12.1: ⇒ Yassa cittaṃ uppajjati tassa cittaṃ uppannanti?
ya8.2.1:13.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana cittaṃ uppannaṃ tassa cittaṃ uppajjatīti?
ya8.2.1:14.1: Cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ, no ca tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati.
ya8.2.1:14.2: Cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ uppannañceva uppajjati ca.
ya8.2.1:15.1: ⇒ Yassa cittaṃ na uppajjati tassa cittaṃ na uppannanti?
ya8.2.1:16.1: Cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ cittaṃ na uppannaṃ.
ya8.2.1:16.2: Nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ cittaṃ na ceva uppajjati na ca uppannaṃ.
ya8.2.1:17.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana cittaṃ na uppannaṃ tassa cittaṃ na uppajjatīti?
ya8.2.1:19.1: ⇒ Yassa cittaṃ nirujjhati tassa cittaṃ uppannanti?
ya8.2.1:20.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana cittaṃ uppannaṃ tassa cittaṃ nirujjhatīti?
ya8.2.1:21.1: Cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ, no ca tesaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhati.
ya8.2.1:21.2: Cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ uppannañceva nirujjhati ca.
ya8.2.1:22.1: ⇒ Yassa cittaṃ na nirujjhati tassa cittaṃ na uppannanti?
ya8.2.1:23.1: Cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ cittaṃ na uppannaṃ.
ya8.2.1:23.2: Nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ cittaṃ na ceva nirujjhati na ca uppannaṃ.
ya8.2.1:24.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana cittaṃ na uppannaṃ tassa cittaṃ na nirujjhatīti?
ya8.2.1:26.1: ⇒ Yassa cittaṃ uppajjati tassa cittaṃ uppajjitthāti?
ya8.2.1:27.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana cittaṃ uppajjittha tassa cittaṃ uppajjatīti?
ya8.2.1:28.1: Cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati.
ya8.2.1:28.2: Cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjittha ceva uppajjati ca.
ya8.2.1:29.1: ⇒ Yassa cittaṃ na uppajjati tassa cittaṃ na uppajjitthāti?
ya8.2.1:30.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana cittaṃ na uppajjittha tassa cittaṃ na uppajjatīti?
ya8.2.1:31.1: ⇒ Yassa cittaṃ uppajjati tassa cittaṃ uppajjissatīti?
ya8.2.1:32.1: Pacchimacittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjissati.
ya8.2.1:32.2: Itaresaṃ cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati ceva uppajjissati ca.
ya8.2.1:33.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana cittaṃ uppajjissati tassa cittaṃ uppajjatīti?
ya8.2.1:34.1: Cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati.
ya8.2.1:34.2: Cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjissati ceva uppajjati ca.
ya8.2.1:35.1: ⇒ Yassa cittaṃ na uppajjati tassa cittaṃ na uppajjissatīti?
ya8.2.1:36.1: Cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjissati.
ya8.2.1:36.2: Pacchimacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ na ceva uppajjati na ca uppajjissati.
ya8.2.1:37.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana cittaṃ na uppajjissati tassa cittaṃ na uppajjatīti?
ya8.2.1:38.1: Pacchimacittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjati.
ya8.2.1:38.2: Pacchimacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ na ceva uppajjissati na ca uppajjati.
ya8.2.1:39.1: ⇒ Yassa cittaṃ uppajjittha tassa cittaṃ uppajjissatīti?
ya8.2.1:40.1: Pacchimacittasamaṅgīnaṃ tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjissati.
ya8.2.1:40.2: Itaresaṃ tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjittha ceva uppajjissati ca.
ya8.2.1:41.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana cittaṃ uppajjissati tassa cittaṃ uppajjitthāti?
ya8.2.1:42.1: ⇒ Yassa cittaṃ na uppajjittha tassa cittaṃ na uppajjissatīti?
ya8.2.1:43.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana cittaṃ na uppajjissati tassa cittaṃ na uppajjitthāti?
ya8.2.1:45.1: ⇒ Yassa cittaṃ nirujjhati tassa cittaṃ nirujjhitthāti?
ya8.2.1:46.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana cittaṃ nirujjhittha tassa cittaṃ nirujjhatīti?
ya8.2.1:47.1: Cittassa uppādakkhaṇe nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhittha, no ca tesaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhati.
ya8.2.1:47.2: Cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhittha ceva nirujjhati ca.
ya8.2.1:48.1: ⇒ Yassa cittaṃ na nirujjhati tassa cittaṃ na nirujjhitthāti?
ya8.2.1:49.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana cittaṃ na nirujjhittha tassa cittaṃ na nirujjhatīti?
ya8.2.1:50.1: ⇒ Yassa cittaṃ nirujjhati tassa cittaṃ nirujjhissatīti?
ya8.2.1:51.1: Pacchimacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhissati.
ya8.2.1:51.2: Itaresaṃ cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhati ceva nirujjhissati ca.
ya8.2.1:52.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana cittaṃ nirujjhissati tassa cittaṃ nirujjhatīti?
ya8.2.1:53.1: Cittassa uppādakkhaṇe nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhati.
ya8.2.1:53.2: Cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhissati ceva nirujjhati ca.
ya8.2.1:54.1: ⇒ Yassa cittaṃ na nirujjhati tassa cittaṃ na nirujjhissatīti?
ya8.2.1:55.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana cittaṃ na nirujjhissati tassa cittaṃ na nirujjhatīti?
ya8.2.1:56.1: ⇒ Yassa cittaṃ nirujjhittha tassa cittaṃ nirujjhissatīti?
ya8.2.1:57.1: Pacchimacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhittha, no ca tesaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhissati.
ya8.2.1:57.2: Itaresaṃ tesaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhittha ceva nirujjhissati ca.
ya8.2.1:58.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana cittaṃ nirujjhissati tassa cittaṃ nirujjhitthāti?
ya8.2.1:59.1: ⇒ Yassa cittaṃ na nirujjhittha tassa cittaṃ na nirujjhissatīti?
ya8.2.1:60.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana cittaṃ na nirujjhissati tassa cittaṃ na nirujjhitthāti?
ya8.2.1:62.1: ⇒ Yassa cittaṃ uppajjati tassa cittaṃ nirujjhitthāti?
ya8.2.1:63.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana cittaṃ nirujjhittha tassa cittaṃ uppajjatīti?
ya8.2.1:64.1: Cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhittha, no ca tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati.
ya8.2.1:64.2: Cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhittha ceva uppajjati ca.
ya8.2.1:65.1: ⇒ Yassa cittaṃ na uppajjati tassa cittaṃ na nirujjhitthāti?
ya8.2.1:66.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana cittaṃ na nirujjhittha tassa cittaṃ na uppajjatīti?
ya8.2.1:67.1: ⇒ Yassa cittaṃ uppajjati tassa cittaṃ nirujjhissatīti?
ya8.2.1:68.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana cittaṃ nirujjhissati tassa cittaṃ uppajjatīti?
ya8.2.1:69.1: Cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhissati, no ca tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati.
ya8.2.1:69.2: Cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhissati ceva uppajjati ca.
ya8.2.1:70.1: ⇒ Yassa cittaṃ na uppajjati tassa cittaṃ na nirujjhissatīti?
ya8.2.1:71.1: Cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhissati.
ya8.2.1:71.2: Pacchimacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ na ceva uppajjati na ca nirujjhissati.
ya8.2.1:72.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana cittaṃ na nirujjhissati tassa cittaṃ na uppajjatīti?
ya8.2.1:73.1: ⇒ Yassa cittaṃ uppajjittha tassa cittaṃ nirujjhissatīti?
ya8.2.1:74.1: Pacchimacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhissati.
ya8.2.1:74.2: Itaresaṃ tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjittha ceva nirujjhissati ca.
ya8.2.1:75.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana cittaṃ nirujjhissati tassa cittaṃ uppajjitthāti?
ya8.2.1:76.1: ⇒ Yassa cittaṃ na uppajjittha tassa cittaṃ na nirujjhissatīti?
ya8.2.1:77.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana cittaṃ na nirujjhissati tassa cittaṃ na uppajjitthāti?
ya8.2.1:79.1: ⇒ Yassa cittaṃ uppajjati tassa cittaṃ na nirujjhatīti?
ya8.2.1:80.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana cittaṃ na nirujjhati tassa cittaṃ uppajjatīti?
ya8.2.1:81.1: Nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhati, no ca tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati.
ya8.2.1:81.2: Cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhati ceva uppajjati ca.
ya8.2.1:82.1: ⇒ Yassa cittaṃ na uppajjati tassa cittaṃ nirujjhatīti?
ya8.2.1:83.1: Nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjati, no ca tesaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhati.
ya8.2.1:83.2: Cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjati ceva nirujjhati ca.
ya8.2.1:84.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana cittaṃ nirujjhati tassa cittaṃ na uppajjatīti?
ya8.2.1:86.1: ⇒ Yassa cittaṃ uppajjamānaṃ tassa cittaṃ uppannanti?
ya8.2.1:87.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana cittaṃ uppannaṃ tassa cittaṃ uppajjamānanti?
ya8.2.1:88.1: Cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ, no ca tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjamānaṃ.
ya8.2.1:88.2: Cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ uppannañceva uppajjamānañca.
ya8.2.1:89.1: ⇒ Yassa cittaṃ na uppajjamānaṃ tassa cittaṃ na uppannanti?
ya8.2.1:90.1: Cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjamānaṃ, no ca tesaṃ cittaṃ na uppannaṃ.
ya8.2.1:90.2: Nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ cittaṃ na ceva uppajjamānaṃ na ca uppannaṃ.
ya8.2.1:91.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana cittaṃ na uppannaṃ tassa cittaṃ na uppajjamānanti?
ya8.2.1:93.1: ⇒ Yassa cittaṃ nirujjhamānaṃ tassa cittaṃ uppannanti?
ya8.2.1:94.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana cittaṃ uppannaṃ tassa cittaṃ nirujjhamānanti?
ya8.2.1:95.1: Cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ, no ca tesaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhamānaṃ.
ya8.2.1:95.2: Cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ uppannañceva nirujjhamānañca.
ya8.2.1:96.1: ⇒ Yassa cittaṃ na nirujjhamānaṃ tassa cittaṃ na uppannanti?
ya8.2.1:97.1: Cittassa uppādakkhaṇe tesaṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhamānaṃ, no ca tesaṃ cittaṃ na uppannaṃ.
ya8.2.1:97.2: Nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ cittaṃ na ceva nirujjhamānaṃ na ca uppannaṃ.
ya8.2.1:98.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana cittaṃ na uppannaṃ tassa cittaṃ na nirujjhamānanti?
ya8.2.1:100.1: ⇒ Yassa cittaṃ uppannaṃ tassa cittaṃ uppajjitthāti?
ya8.2.1:101.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana cittaṃ uppajjittha tassa cittaṃ uppannanti?
ya8.2.1:102.1: Nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjittha, no ca tesaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ.
ya8.2.1:102.2: Cittasamaṅgīnaṃ tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjittha ceva uppannañca.
ya8.2.1:103.1: ⇒ Yassa cittaṃ na uppannaṃ tassa cittaṃ na uppajjitthāti?
ya8.2.1:104.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana cittaṃ na uppajjittha tassa cittaṃ na uppannanti?
ya8.2.1:105.1: ⇒ Yassa cittaṃ uppannaṃ tassa cittaṃ uppajjissatīti?
ya8.2.1:106.1: Pacchimacittasamaṅgīnaṃ tesaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ, no ca tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjissati.
ya8.2.1:106.2: Itaresaṃ cittasamaṅgīnaṃ tesaṃ cittaṃ uppannañceva uppajjissati ca.
ya8.2.1:107.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana cittaṃ uppajjissati tassa cittaṃ uppannanti?
ya8.2.1:108.1: Nirodhasamāpannānaṃ asaññasattānaṃ tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjissati, no ca tesaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ.
ya8.2.1:108.2: Cittasamaṅgīnaṃ tesaṃ cittaṃ uppajjissati ceva uppannañca.
ya8.2.1:109.1: ⇒ Yassa cittaṃ na uppannaṃ tassa cittaṃ na uppajjissatīti?
ya8.2.1:110.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana cittaṃ na uppajjissati tassa cittaṃ na uppannanti?
ya8.2.1:112.1: ⇒ Yassa cittaṃ uppajjittha no ca tassa cittaṃ uppannaṃ, tassa cittaṃ uppajjissatīti?
ya8.2.1:113.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana cittaṃ uppajjissati no ca tassa cittaṃ uppannaṃ, tassa cittaṃ uppajjitthāti?
ya8.2.1:114.1: ⇒ Yassa cittaṃ na uppajjittha no ca tassa cittaṃ na uppannaṃ, tassa cittaṃ na uppajjissatīti?
ya8.2.1:115.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana cittaṃ na uppajjissati no ca tassa cittaṃ na uppannaṃ, tassa cittaṃ na uppajjitthāti?
ya8.2.1:122.1: Bhaṅgakkhaṇe na uppajjamānaṃ, no ca na uppannaṃ.
ya8.2.1:122.2: Atītānāgataṃ cittaṃ na ceva uppajjamānaṃ na ca uppannaṃ.
ya8.2.1:127.1: Bhaṅgakkhaṇe na niruddhaṃ, no ca na nirujjhamānaṃ.
ya8.2.1:127.2: Uppādakkhaṇe anāgatañca cittaṃ na ceva niruddhaṃ na ca nirujjhamānaṃ.
ya8.2.1:129.1: Atītaṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhamānaṃ, no ca na niruddhaṃ.
ya8.2.1:129.2: Uppādakkhaṇe anāgatañca cittaṃ na ceva nirujjhamānaṃ na ca niruddhaṃ.
ya8.2.1:131.1: ⇒ Yassa cittaṃ uppajjamānaṃ khaṇaṃ khaṇaṃ vītikkantaṃ atikkantakālaṃ, nirujjhamānaṃ khaṇaṃ khaṇaṃ vītikkantaṃ atikkantakālaṃ tassa cittanti?
ya8.2.1:132.1: Bhaṅgakkhaṇe cittaṃ uppādakkhaṇaṃ vītikkantaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇaṃ avītikkantaṃ, atītaṃ cittaṃ uppādakkhaṇañca vītikkantaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇañca vītikkantaṃ.
ya8.2.1:133.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana cittaṃ nirujjhamānaṃ khaṇaṃ khaṇaṃ vītikkantaṃ atikkantakālaṃ, uppajjamānaṃ khaṇaṃ khaṇaṃ vītikkantaṃ atikkantakālaṃ tassa cittanti?
ya8.2.1:135.1: ⇒ Yassa cittaṃ na uppajjamānaṃ khaṇaṃ khaṇaṃ vītikkantaṃ atikkantakālaṃ, na nirujjhamānaṃ khaṇaṃ khaṇaṃ vītikkantaṃ atikkantakālaṃ tassa cittanti?
ya8.2.1:137.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana cittaṃ na nirujjhamānaṃ khaṇaṃ khaṇaṃ vītikkantaṃ atikkantakālaṃ, na uppajjamānaṃ khaṇaṃ khaṇaṃ vītikkantaṃ atikkantakālaṃ tassa cittanti?
ya8.2.1:138.1: Bhaṅgakkhaṇe cittaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇaṃ avītikkantaṃ no ca uppādakkhaṇaṃ avītikkantaṃ, uppādakkhaṇe anāgatañca cittaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇañca avītikkantaṃ uppādakkhaṇañca avītikkantaṃ.
ya8.2.1:141.1: ⇒ Yaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati na nirujjhati taṃ cittaṃ nirujjhissati na uppajjissatīti?
ya8.2.1:142.1: ⇐ Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ nirujjhissati na uppajjissati taṃ cittaṃ uppajjati na nirujjhatīti?
ya8.2.1:143.1: ⇒ Yaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjati nirujjhati taṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhissati uppajjissatīti?
ya8.2.1:144.1: ⇐ Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ na nirujjhissati uppajjissati taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjati nirujjhatīti?
ya8.2.1:146.1: ⇒ Yaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati taṃ cittaṃ uppannanti?
ya8.2.1:147.1: ⇐ Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ uppannaṃ taṃ cittaṃ uppajjatīti?
ya8.2.1:148.1: Bhaṅgakkhaṇe cittaṃ uppannaṃ, no ca taṃ cittaṃ uppajjati.
ya8.2.1:149.1: ⇒ Yaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjati taṃ cittaṃ na uppannanti?
ya8.2.1:150.1: Bhaṅgakkhaṇe cittaṃ na uppajjati, no ca taṃ cittaṃ na uppannaṃ.
ya8.2.1:150.2: Atītānāgataṃ cittaṃ na ceva uppajjati na ca uppannaṃ.
ya8.2.1:151.1: ⇐ Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ na uppannaṃ taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjatīti?
ya8.2.1:153.1: ⇒ Yaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhati taṃ cittaṃ uppannanti?
ya8.2.1:154.1: ⇐ Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ uppannaṃ taṃ cittaṃ nirujjhatīti?
ya8.2.1:155.1: Uppādakkhaṇe cittaṃ uppannaṃ, no ca taṃ cittaṃ nirujjhati.
ya8.2.1:156.1: ⇒ Yaṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhati taṃ cittaṃ na uppannanti?
ya8.2.1:157.1: Uppādakkhaṇe cittaṃ na nirujjhati, no ca taṃ cittaṃ na uppannaṃ.
ya8.2.1:157.2: Atītānāgataṃ cittaṃ na ceva nirujjhati na ca uppannaṃ.
ya8.2.1:158.1: ⇐ Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ na uppannaṃ taṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhatīti?

ya8.2.1:217.1: ⇒ Yaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati taṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhatīti?

ya8.2.1:222.1: ⇐ Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ nirujjhati taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjatīti?
ya8.2.1:224.1: ⇒ Yaṃ cittaṃ uppajjamānaṃ taṃ cittaṃ uppannanti?

ya8.2.1:229.1: ⇐ Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ na uppannaṃ taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjamānanti?
ya8.2.1:231.1: ⇒ Yaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhamānaṃ taṃ cittaṃ uppannanti?

ya8.2.1:234.1: ⇒ Yaṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhamānaṃ taṃ cittaṃ na uppannanti?

ya8.2.1:238.1: ⇒ Yaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ taṃ cittaṃ uppajjitthāti?
ya8.2.1:239.1: ⇐ Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ uppajjittha taṃ cittaṃ uppannanti?

ya8.2.1:243.2: Anāgataṃ cittaṃ na ceva uppajjittha na ca uppannaṃ.
ya8.2.1:244.1: ⇒ Yaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ taṃ cittaṃ uppajjissatīti?
ya8.2.1:245.1: ⇐ Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ uppajjissati taṃ cittaṃ uppannanti?
ya8.2.1:246.1: ⇒ Yaṃ cittaṃ na uppannaṃ taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjissatīti?
ya8.2.1:247.1: Anāgataṃ cittaṃ na uppannaṃ, no ca taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjissati.
ya8.2.1:247.2: Atītaṃ cittaṃ na ceva uppannaṃ na ca uppajjissati.
ya8.2.1:248.1: ⇐ Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ na uppajjissati taṃ cittaṃ na uppannanti?
ya8.2.1:249.1: Paccuppannaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjissati, no ca taṃ cittaṃ na uppannaṃ.
ya8.2.1:249.2: Atītaṃ cittaṃ na ceva uppajjissati na ca uppannaṃ.
ya8.2.1:251.1: ⇒ Yaṃ cittaṃ uppajjittha no ca taṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ, taṃ cittaṃ uppajjissatīti?
ya8.2.1:252.1: ⇐ Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ uppajjissati no ca taṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ, taṃ cittaṃ uppajjitthāti?
ya8.2.1:253.1: ⇒ Yaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjittha no ca taṃ cittaṃ na uppannaṃ, taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjissatīti?
ya8.2.1:254.1: ⇐ Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ na uppajjissati no ca taṃ cittaṃ na uppannaṃ, taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjitthāti?
ya8.2.1:261.1: Bhaṅgakkhaṇe na uppajjamānaṃ, no ca na uppannaṃ.
ya8.2.1:261.2: Atītānāgataṃ cittaṃ na ceva uppajjamānaṃ na ca uppannaṃ.
ya8.2.1:266.1: Bhaṅgakkhaṇe na niruddhaṃ, no ca na nirujjhamānaṃ.
ya8.2.1:266.2: Uppādakkhaṇe anāgatañca cittaṃ na ceva niruddhaṃ na ca nirujjhamānaṃ.
ya8.2.1:268.1: Atītaṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhamānaṃ, no ca na niruddhaṃ.
ya8.2.1:268.2: Uppādakkhaṇe anāgatañca cittaṃ na ceva nirujjhamānaṃ na ca niruddhaṃ.
ya8.2.1:270.1: ⇒ Yaṃ cittaṃ uppajjamānaṃ khaṇaṃ khaṇaṃ vītikkantaṃ atikkantakālaṃ, nirujjhamānaṃ khaṇaṃ khaṇaṃ vītikkantaṃ atikkantakālaṃ taṃ cittanti?
ya8.2.1:271.1: Bhaṅgakkhaṇe cittaṃ uppādakkhaṇaṃ vītikkantaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇaṃ avītikkantaṃ, atītaṃ cittaṃ uppādakkhaṇañca vītikkantaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇañca vītikkantaṃ.
ya8.2.1:272.1: ⇐ Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ nirujjhamānaṃ khaṇaṃ khaṇaṃ vītikkantaṃ atikkantakālaṃ, uppajjamānaṃ khaṇaṃ khaṇaṃ vītikkantaṃ atikkantakālaṃ taṃ cittanti?
ya8.2.1:273.1: ⇒ Yaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjamānaṃ khaṇaṃ khaṇaṃ vītikkantaṃ atikkantakālaṃ, na nirujjhamānaṃ khaṇaṃ khaṇaṃ vītikkantaṃ atikkantakālaṃ taṃ cittanti?
ya8.2.1:275.1: ⇐ Yaṃ vā pana cittaṃ na nirujjhamānaṃ khaṇaṃ khaṇaṃ vītikkantaṃ atikkantakālaṃ, na uppajjamānaṃ khaṇaṃ khaṇaṃ vītikkantaṃ atikkantakālaṃ taṃ cittanti?
ya8.2.1:276.1: Bhaṅgakkhaṇe cittaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇaṃ avītikkantaṃ no ca uppādakkhaṇaṃ avītikkantaṃ, uppādakkhaṇe anāgatañca cittaṃ bhaṅgakkhaṇañca avītikkantaṃ uppādakkhaṇañca avītikkantaṃ.
ya8.2.1:279.1: ⇒ Yassa yaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati na nirujjhati tassa taṃ cittaṃ nirujjhissati na uppajjissatīti?
ya8.2.1:280.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana yaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhissati na uppajjissati tassa taṃ cittaṃ uppajjati na nirujjhatīti?
ya8.2.1:281.1: ⇒ Yassa yaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjati nirujjhati tassa taṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhissati uppajjissatīti?
ya8.2.1:282.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana yaṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhissati uppajjissati tassa taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjati nirujjhatīti?
ya8.2.1:284.1: ⇒ Yassa yaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati tassa taṃ cittaṃ uppannanti?
ya8.2.1:285.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana yaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ tassa taṃ cittaṃ uppajjatīti?
ya8.2.1:286.1: Bhaṅgakkhaṇe cittaṃ uppannaṃ, no ca tassa taṃ cittaṃ uppajjati.
ya8.2.1:287.1: ⇒ Yassa yaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjati tassa taṃ cittaṃ na uppannanti?
ya8.2.1:288.1: Bhaṅgakkhaṇe cittaṃ na uppajjati, no ca tassa taṃ cittaṃ na uppannaṃ.
ya8.2.1:288.2: Atītānāgataṃ cittaṃ na ceva uppajjati na ca uppannaṃ.
ya8.2.1:289.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana yaṃ cittaṃ na uppannaṃ tassa taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjatīti?
ya8.2.1:291.1: ⇒ Yassa yaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhati tassa taṃ cittaṃ uppannanti?
ya8.2.1:292.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana yaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ tassa taṃ cittaṃ nirujjhatīti?
ya8.2.1:293.1: Uppādakkhaṇe cittaṃ uppannaṃ, no ca tassa taṃ cittaṃ nirujjhati.

ya8.2.1:312.1: ⇒ Yassa yaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjittha tassa taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjissatīti?
ya8.2.1:313.1: Anāgataṃ cittaṃ na uppajjittha, no ca tassa taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjissati.
ya8.2.1:313.2: Paccuppannaṃ cittaṃ na ceva uppajjittha na ca uppajjissati.
ya8.2.1:314.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana yaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjissati tassa taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjitthāti?
ya8.2.1:315.1: Atītaṃ cittaṃ na uppajjissati, no ca tassa taṃ cittaṃ na uppajjittha.
ya8.2.1:315.2: Paccuppannaṃ cittaṃ na ceva uppajjissati na ca uppajjittha.
ya8.2.1:317.1: ⇒ Yassa yaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhati tassa taṃ cittaṃ nirujjhitthāti?
ya8.2.1:318.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana yaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhittha tassa taṃ cittaṃ nirujjhatīti?
ya8.2.1:319.1: ⇒ Yassa yaṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhati tassa taṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhitthāti?
ya8.2.1:320.1: Atītaṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhati, no ca tassa taṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhittha.
ya8.2.1:320.2: Uppādakkhaṇe anāgatañca cittaṃ na ceva nirujjhati na ca nirujjhittha.
ya8.2.1:321.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana yaṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhittha tassa taṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhatīti?
ya8.2.1:322.1: Bhaṅgakkhaṇe cittaṃ na nirujjhittha, no ca tassa taṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhati.
ya8.2.1:322.2: Uppādakkhaṇe anāgatañca cittaṃ na ceva nirujjhittha na ca nirujjhati.
ya8.2.1:323.1: ⇒ Yassa yaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhati tassa taṃ cittaṃ nirujjhissatīti?
ya8.2.1:324.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana yaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhissati tassa taṃ cittaṃ nirujjhatīti?
ya8.2.1:325.1: ⇒ Yassa yaṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhati tassa taṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhissatīti?
ya8.2.1:326.1: Uppādakkhaṇe anāgatañca cittaṃ na nirujjhati, no ca tassa taṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhissati.
ya8.2.1:326.2: Atītaṃ cittaṃ na ceva nirujjhati na ca nirujjhissati.
ya8.2.1:327.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana yaṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhissati tassa taṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhatīti?
ya8.2.1:328.1: Bhaṅgakkhaṇe cittaṃ na nirujjhissati, no ca tassa taṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhati.
ya8.2.1:328.2: Atītaṃ cittaṃ na ceva nirujjhissati na ca nirujjhati.
ya8.2.1:329.1: ⇒ Yassa yaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhittha tassa taṃ cittaṃ nirujjhissatīti?
ya8.2.1:330.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana yaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhissati tassa taṃ cittaṃ nirujjhitthāti?
ya8.2.1:331.1: ⇒ Yassa yaṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhittha tassa taṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhissatīti?
ya8.2.1:332.1: Uppādakkhaṇe anāgatañca cittaṃ na nirujjhittha, no ca tassa taṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhissati.
ya8.2.1:332.2: Bhaṅgakkhaṇe cittaṃ na ceva nirujjhittha na ca nirujjhissati.
ya8.2.1:333.1: ⇐ Yassa vā pana yaṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhissati tassa taṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhitthāti?
ya8.2.1:334.1: Atītaṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhissati, no ca tassa taṃ cittaṃ na nirujjhittha.
ya8.2.1:334.2: Bhaṅgakkhaṇe cittaṃ na ceva nirujjhissati na ca nirujjhittha.
ya8.2.1:335.1: (Yassa cittake sakabhāvena niddiṭṭhe, yaṃ cittake ca yassa yaṃ cittake ca ekattena niddiṭṭhe.)
